__e: So, there's a lot of opportunity for a guy like me in this town?
You feel sorry for the guy, But he had every opportunity to make it right... and he didn't, you know?
I have had plently of opportunities to return the favor, but I have chosen not to because, yes, I know, it's not what we do.
I kept my mind open to new possibilities and that keeps me going.
I mean this... more than you realize. "You're no earthly good at all "unless you take this opportunity and do whatever you have to."
I mean, I think it's opportunity and your own personality, and the job that I do would possibly have made it more difficult than it might otherwise have been.
For whatever reason you begin when you start living this way, it's not very easy to live any other way... and not much chance.
A guy like you, works at home, you got plenty of opportunity for going next door.
Back in the day, when I was with Ben, I had so many opportunities to do things that I really wanted to do, but I didn't do them because he didn't want to.
I mean, after all that she's done for me, all the opportunities that she's given me.
All I did was give her the opportunities that she wanted.
I don't know if I really like him or if he just reminds me of the opportunities I missed when I was younger.
Two opportunities to die I missed.
"Problems are just opportunities in work clothes."
